Info

  • The snakes grow and their speed increases as they eat food.
  • 2 player games end when one player causes the other to collide with the wall or snake body. The points don't matter!
  • In a 2 player game the first player is the black snake and uses W,S,A,D to move. The second player is the blue snake and uses the arrow keys to move.
  • More food will spawn once all food has been cleared.
  • You can play with walls on or off. When the wall is off the snake will go into the wall and come out of the opposite wall instead of losing.
  • You can turn the grid off to make the game easier
